00029 #ifndef _TICKCTRL_H_
00030 #define _TICKCTRL_H_
00031 
00032 #include "inxout.h"
00033 #include "queue.h"
00034 
00035 //tolua_begin
00036 class   tickctrl: public inxout {
00037    typedef      inxout  baseclass;
00038 
00039 public: 
00040    enum {
00041       keyTick = 1
00042    };
00043 
00044    tickctrl();
00045    ~tickctrl();
00046    int act(void);
00047    event evtTick;       // event for the late() method (called if arrival)
00048    void setTable(void *tab){table = (tim_typ*)tab;}
00049    void *getTable(void){return table;}
00050    void restim(void);
00051 //tolua_end   
00052    rec_typ REC(data *, int);    // REC is a macro normally expanding to rec (for debugging)
00053    void early(event *);
00054    void late(event *);  
00055    int export(exp_typ *);
00056 //tolua_begin
00057    int contproc;        // number of contending processes
00058    int actproc;         // the active process now (0 is this one)
00059    tim_typ next_time;   // the next time, where we can send after timeout
00060    tim_typ last_received;     // the time, when the last data has been received
00061    tim_typ off_int;  // the time interval, when going off is detected
00062    tim_typ old_tm;
00063    int     phase;
00064 
00065    uqueue q;
00066    int alarmed;         // is early alarmed?
00067 
00068    int  q_max;
00069    int  q_start;        // queue length at which to wake up the sender
00070    rec_typ prec_state;  // state of the preceeding object
00071    rec_typ send_state;  // running or stopped?
00072 
00073    enum {SucData=0, SucCtrl=1};
00074    enum {InpData = 0, InpStart = 1};
00075         
00076 //tolua_end
00077    tim_typ *table;      // the distribution of the tick value
00078 }; //tolua_export
